name: Elements.get.Rotation
description:
This node give the rotation in radians and degrees of elements that are placed in a project/family. 
The rotation is counterclockwise and based on the original orientation.

Input is an elements or list of elements
output is a list in radian and degrees
contents:
Elements.get.Rotation - This node give the rotation in radians and degrees of elements that are placed in a project/family. 
The rotation is counterclockwise and based on the original orientation.

Input is an elements or list of elements
output is a list in radian and degrees
